channel.description: math.SP updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: Positivity of spectral shift functions and infinite-dimensional BMV conjecture
item.description: arXiv:2512.05587v1 Announce Type: cross Abstract: We obtain a solution to the Bessis-Moussa-Villani conjecture for a trace-class perturbation of a semi-bounded operator and answer affirmatively the question on positivity of higher order spectral shift functions in the setting of Schatten--von Neumann perturbations of (possibly unbounded) self-adjoint operators.
item.dc:creator: Chandan Pradhan, Anna Skripka
